page.title: 10PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: You really need a car if you live in Ashwell or Newnham. There is a{railway station}on the line between Hitchin and Cambridge and there are frequent electric trains to Kings Cross, London. But the station is about 2 Km. from Ashwell and you need a bike or car to get there. There is still a{bus service}through Ashwell and Newnham which lie on the journey between Royston and Baldock. The bus is very infrequent. People who can't afford cars have to walk or get around by bike.This really means that they have to stay in the village for most of the time. Many people complained about the{poor bus {service.}They said it used to be much better. People said that lack of good public transport was one of the worst things about living in Ashwell.
